title: The Midlands Ripper - Part 2/2. Episode 281
description:
In the second part of this story, we follow the trial of Alun Kyte as he stands trial for the murders of Samo Paull and Tracy Turner. And were there other victims ? I look at others who may have lost their life at the hands of the so-called 'Midlands Ripper'.

1,Â  Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair.
